descriptions.name: Logo Quiz
descriptions.description: Logo Quiz is a free trivia app where you guess the brands names of thousands of logos from popular companies.

descriptions.name: Logo Quiz
descriptions.description: Logos Quiz ist ein kostenloses, unterhaltsames Spiel, bei dem man die Firmenzeichen weltberühmter Marken errät!

descriptions.name: Logo Quiz
descriptions.description: Logos Quiz est un jeu gratuit très amusant qui consiste à deviner les noms de centaines de logos de différentes entreprises.

descriptions.name: Logo Quiz
descriptions.description: Logos Quiz es un juego gratuito lleno de diversión que consiste en adivinar el nombre de cientos de logotipos de diferentes compañias y empresas.

descriptions.name: Logo Quiz
descriptions.description: Indovina i loghi di famose aziende di tutto il mondo!

descriptions.name: Logo Quiz
descriptions.description: A Logo Quiz egy ingyenes játék, amelyben több ezer híres vállalat logóját kell kitalálni.

descriptions.name: Logo Quiz
descriptions.description: Odgaduj loga popularnych firm z całego świata!

descriptions.name: Logo Quiz
descriptions.description: O Logo Quiz é um jogo gratuito no qual você adivinha os nomes de milhares de logotipos de empresas famosas.

descriptions.name: Logo Quiz
descriptions.description: Gjette på logoer av populære selskaper fra hele verden!

descriptions.name: Logo Quiz
descriptions.description: Угадайте, на логотипы популярных компаний со всего мира!

descriptions.name: Logo Quiz
descriptions.description: Logo Quiz, popüler şirketlere ait binlerce logonun marka adlarını tahmin ettiğiniz ücretsiz bir bilgi uygulamasıdır.
